com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast.template.instruction

Interface IStopBitEncoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NonNullableStopBitEncoder, NullableStopBitEncoder

    public interface IStopBitEncoder
    Common interface for classes that encode stop bit delimited values to a BytesSegment.

    The treatment of null or undefined values passed to encoding methods depends on the encoder. If the encoder supports nulls, the value will be encoded as a FAST null. If the encoder does not support null, a FastCodecException is thrown.

    The length of the supplied BytesSegment is incremented by the number of bytes encoded.

    The BytesSgment is automatically extended if necessary (by calling BytesSegment.grow(int, boolean)).

    Author:
    John Cameron

    • Method Detail

      • encodeByteVector

        void encodeByteVector(IField field,
                      IValue value,
                      BytesSegment data)
               throws FastCodecException
        Encode the given value as a byte vector on to the end of the given BytesSegment.

        If the value cannot be converted to a byte vector a FastCodecException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        field - Used only when FastCodecException is thrown to provide template and field name
        value - Value to be encoded
        data - Destination for encoded bytes.
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - If there is a problem encoding the value.
        NullPointerException - If data is null.

      • setSpy

        void setSpy(ISpy spy)
        Associates a spy with the encoder.

        May be null - in which case no spy is associated (the default).

        Parameters:
        spy - FAST encoding displayer
